channel.title: [317] How to add working ancient spells?
channel.description: I recently coded this blank source, but there was a problem. No ancient spells. Whenever I try and use Ice Barrage on a player or npc, it disconnects me? So, how do you add working barrage, blitz, etc? Help is appreciated :) EDIT::: my friend told me you needed a packet? Where can I get it and how do I put it on the source?

item.title: [317] How to add working ancient spells?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

I recently coded this blank source, but there was a problem. No ancient spells. Whenever I try and use Ice Barrage on a player or npc, it disconnects me? So, how do you add working barrage, blitz, etc? Help is appreciated
EDIT::: my friend told me you needed a packet? Where can I get it and how do I put it on the source?
